summary: HEADLIGHTS ON THESE CARS ARE EXTREMLY DIM ON LOWBEAM TO THE POINT OF BEING DANGEROUS TO THE DRIVER AND OTHER VEHICLES ON THE ROAD. THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM WITH CADILLAC MODELS 2012 THRU 2017. WAS TOLD BY THE DEALERSHIP CADILLAC KNOWS ABOUT IT BUT THERE IS NO FIX. ALSO A PROBLEM WITH THE CUE SYSTEM LOCKING UP.
